Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}},
On June 28th at 1pm ET, we will hold a webinar entitled "LinkedIn for Independent Consultants: 5 Steps to Enhance Your Profile & Bring in More Clients."
Whether you are new to the social networking world, or a seasoned professional, it is important for all independent consultants and micro-consulting practices to take pause in their busy schedules to revisit (or create) an online profile on LinkedIn.
This is why we've invited LinkedIn expert, Melissa Washington <http://info.mbopartners.com/June12Web-LinkedIn-Independent-Consultants.html>, who typically charges over $90 per training session, to educate independent consultants and answer your questions about how to best use the LinkedIn network to find new clients.
During this free, hour-long webinar you will learn how to...
- Compose a strong profile headline - Connect to the right people - Communicate your expertise - Build the right group and company presence - Gain more clients
Register today <http://info.mbopartners.com/June12Web-LinkedIn-Independent-Consultants.html> to gain new clients tomorrow! ___________________________________ The MBO Marketing Team t: 1-800-220-0469 e: info@mbopartenrs.com
